name: Garbage Day (itch)
description:
Biweekly Games 1 - Garbage Day

A game about a small robot collecting trash thrown by residents of nearby apartments.

Move the robot to pick up the trash flying off the windows, and take them to the closest dumpster! But be fast: the more trash you store within the robot, the slower it'll move.

Controls:

  • Move Left/Right: Left/Right Arrow Keys or A/D
  • Toss trash in dumpster: Spacebar or Left Mouse Click when nearby dumpster.

More info:

This game was made on a personal challenge to develop and release one game every 2 weeks on my spare time around school and work. I generate a random theme prompt to poll ideas from, and the theme for this game was "The More You have, The Worse It Gets" (which was the theme for Ludum Dare 40). You can read more about this game here.

Credits:

Rest: Me
